contents: Article 3 (Purpose and Status) ① The Sports Council promotes the health and physical strength of the people, improves their leisure time and welfare by carrying out various activities to promote school sports and daily sports by nationalizing sports sports, and enjoys national prestige by nurturing excellent athletes. The purpose is to contribute to the advancement of sports. ② The Korea Sports Council is the only organization representing Korea that has exclusive negotiating rights with the International Olympic Committee and protects, promotes, and develops the Olympic movement, and through this, spreads the principles and values ​​of Olympism and promotes sports. Contribute to international friendship and world peace through Revised on June 8, 2017, ③ The Korea Sports Council represents Korea to international sports organizations such as the International Olympic Committee, the Association of National Olympic Committees (ANOC), and the Olympic Council of Asia (OCA). ④ The Sports Council may cooperate with related ministries or non-governmental organizations to achieve its goals, and must maintain a harmonious relationship with the relevant ministries, but must not be contrary to the Olympic Charter., ⑤ The Sports Council may comply with the National Sports Promotion Act. Except as stipulated in , the provisions of the Olympic Charter and the Civil Act regarding incorporated corporations shall apply mutatis mutandis. Revised on April 2, 2018, ⑥ The Sports Council must strive to protect and improve the human rights and interests of athletes, including athletes, coaches, referees, and sports enthusiasts. Newly established 2020. 10. 13.
